article.bdy:
Example of widely used contactless smart cards are Hong Kong's
Octopus card
, Paris' Calypso_%28RFID%29/ Navigo and
Lisbon
' LisboaViva card, which predate the ISO/IEC 14443 standard. The following tables list smart cards used for public transportation and other electronic purse applications.
Singapore
EZ-Link
add value machine
Novosibirsk (Russia). Transport fare collection terminal CFT

Helsinki area; the card is read remotely.

Octopus card
, a contactless smart card.
